articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Dukes owner pledges to investigate controversial ball change during Oval Test - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He also suggested it was unlikely that the ball might have been part of the 2018 or 2019 batches of Dukes, which offered more for seam bowlers
articles.content: NewsHe also suggested it was unlikely that the ball might have been part of the 2018 or 2019 batches of Dukes, which offered more for seam bowlers
